body: These polished steel vambraces grant a +1 deflection bonus to AC. Once per day, as an immediate action, if the wearer has at least one hand free, when he would normally be hit with an attack from a ranged weapon, he may deflect it with the bracers, taking no damage from it, as if he had the Deflect Arrows feat.
name: Vambraces of Defense
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Wrists/Wrists Slot Wondrous Items/Vambraces of Defense
